about_the_game:
On an isle of unlimited possibilities, what path will you choose?

Untamed Isles is a MMORPG that offers a living world for monster tamers to explore.

These untamed islands allow the tamers to follow their own calling and create their own path. So tamer, what is your calling on the island? Explore the isles with other pathfinders? Build the perfect tame? Cement your legacy as the ultimate battler? Whatever journey you choose, you will be undertaking it with a team of loyal tames by your side.



Most tamers will never meet the same tame twice in the isles. Every base tame has 5 different body parts that can be mixed and matched with other tames. There are also 15 unique moods with different perks and aesthetics, further customizing available tames.

With ten base tames, there will be over 1,500,000 possible tame combinations to discover.






Be among the first adventurers to discover the world of Untamed Isles. Explore isles that are constantly evolving, with a unique weather system changing the environment around you. Possible tame encounters are adjusted based on the weather, time of day, and island biome.





Your tames, your team: Venture into the wilderness to encounter your own monster to tame. The possibilities for unique tames are endless, with 15 subtypes known as “moods” and 5 different body parts that can be mixed and matched. With countless combinations, every tame you encounter could result in a unique and powerful find.
Explore open-world isles: The Isles are full of rich experiences that are constantly evolving. The unique weather system means tame encounters are adjusted based on the weather, time of day, and island biome. The Isles are continuously expanding, with new islands rising from the ocean, each of which will have its own mysteries and stories to conquer.
Master your craft: Grow your reputation and unlock exclusive items through professions. Become a master at fishing, fruit catching, rune charging, and bug catching.
Combat: Turn-based combat never felt so good. Set yourself up for success with live spectate combat and master your strategy.
Harness the power of crystals: Tamer, meet crystals. Crystals are one of your best friends in the world of Untamed Isles. Crystals are used to befriend tames and represent your tames while you travel.
Better together: Join forces with friends or battle other tamers aided by our proximity voice chat.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.14 or newer
  • Processor: Core i5-4690K or AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 780 or AMD R9 290
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Untamed Isles makes heavy use of multi-threading and requires a Shader Model 5.0 capable Graphics driver
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.14 or newer
  • Processor: Core i7-5820K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or AMD RX 590
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Untamed Isles makes heavy use of multi-threading and requires a Shader Model 5.0 capable Graphics driver
